de.a46.memory.gui
Interface ButtonbarListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
MainPanel
public interface ButtonbarListener

Interface ButtonbarListener defines methods that will be called if a mouseclick happens to a button in the ButtonbarPanel.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Till Zoppke

Method Summary
 void exitButtonClicked()
          Called when there was a mouseclick on the exit button.
 void helpButtonClicked()
          Called when there was a mouseclick on the help button.
 void newgameButtonClicked()
          Called when there was a mouseclick on the newgame button.
